column4: Harro, a moment ago, I setup Skype to work on my computer, I have managed to get a the webcam feature working. I am now wondering if I could show what is going on on my desktop instead of looking through my webcam. I have gtk-recordMydesktop setup, could that contribute? :D
you wont need to show threw your webcam if you use vnc or logmein.com
Yah, but I am using Skype
